# Month Plan - Weight Loss Planner

## Core Features
- Personalized weight loss plans
- Progress tracking tools
- Meal planning assistance
- Exercise recommendations
- Motivational content

## Main Sections
- [Home](/) - Overview of features and benefits
- [Plans](/plans) - Subscription plan options
- [Tools](/tools) - Planning and tracking tools
- [Testimonials](/testimonials) - Success stories

## Resources
- [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy) - Data protection information
- [Terms & Conditions](/terms-conditions) - Service terms
- [Contact](/contact) - Support and inquiries

## Technology Stack
- Nuxt.js frontend framework
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Firebase integration
- Google Analytics tracking
